document.full_text: a u.s. court ruling against kuwaiti logistics company agility has dealt a blow to the company's fight against charges it defrauded the u.s. army in multibillion-dollar contracts.
document.title: court ruling a setback to kuwait's agility
lines_and_colors: a u.s. court ruling against kuwaiti logistics company agility has dealt a blow to the company's fight against charges it defrauded the u.s. army in multibillion-dollar contracts.
